name: qBittorrent
short_description: Popular torrent client with web UI, search plugins, and no ads.
description: qBittorrent is a feature-packed, cross-platform torrent client with a clean modern interface. It includes integrated search engine plugins, RSS support, sequential downloading, IP filtering, bandwidth scheduling, and more. The LinuxServer.io Docker image includes the qBittorrent-nox daemon with a web UI. It's a popular alternative to uTorrent with no ads and full feature set.
usecases: Use RSS feeds for automated downloads.
